name: Python
description: Python is a perennially popular language for a wide range of applications. While modern Python tends to be frequently used in machine learning and AI applications, there are many web applications and other software built in it. OpenTelemetry for Python is overall a well-supported and effective telemetry framework.

dimensions.name: Developer Experience
dimensions.description: Python comes with several convenience APIs and extensions designed to comport with language idioms, making it easy to write telemetry in a Pythonic way.

dimensions.name: Instrumentation Libraries
dimensions.description: Python has broad support for the most popular libraries, including a range of AI client libraries.

dimensions.name: Documentation
dimensions.description: While comprehensive, documentation could be easier to comprehend, and requires a bit of domain knowledge about OpenTelemetry.

dimensions.name: Signals
dimensions.description: Traces, metrics, and logs are all supported well.

dimensions.name: Architectures
dimensions.description: OpenTelemetry supports common deployment patterns of Python applications very well.
